imdb.plot outline: Stacey goes to Hungary to uncover the complex reasons so many Gypsy children are removed from their families by the authorities, and witnesses the shocking reality of life for kids taken into children's homes with reports of widespread sexual abuse and prostitution.
imdb.title: Stacey Dooley Investigates: Gypsy Kids Taken From Home
akas: Stacey Dooley Investigates: Gypsy Kids Taken From Home (United Kingdom)
plot: Stacey goes to Hungary to uncover the complex reasons so many Gypsy children are removed from their families by the authorities, and witnesses the shocking reality of life for kids taken into children's homes with reports of widespread sexual abuse and prostitution.
